item.tfc.anvil.tooltip.condition: When R-Clicked + Shifted with an hammer
item.tfc.anvil.tooltip.behaviour: _Welds_ the two items inside the anvil if it's at _welding temperature_.
item.tfc.large_vessel.tooltip.summary: Handy storage with _9 slots_ that can also _preserve_ food.
item.tfc.large_vessel.tooltip2.condition: When Sealed Vessel is Picked Up
item.tfc.barrel.tooltip.summary: _Essential device_ for various process such as _leather_ and other things.
item.tfc.barrel.tooltip2.condition: When Sealed Barrel is Picked Up
item.tfc.vessel.tooltip.summary: Early game _Alloying_ Container with _4 Slots_ for Items.
item.tfc.vessel.tooltip2.behaviour: _Opens_ the _Pouring Interface_ allowing to pour molten metals into _other ceramic molds_.
item.tfc.firestarter.tooltip.behaviour: _Tries_ to start a _fire_. Can take _some times_ for the sparkles to light up.
item.tfc.composter.tooltip.condition: When Filled Up with 4 Green Items and 4 Brown Items.
item.tfc.pot.tooltip.behaviour: _Adds_ the Pot on top of the Firepit, allowing it to be _used for cooking_.
item.tfc.grill.tooltip.behaviour: _Adds_ the Grill on top of the Firepit, allowing it to be _used for cooking_.
item.tfc.powderkeg.tooltip.behaviour: _Explode proportionally_ depending on the number of _gunpowder inside_.
item.tfc.pan.tooltip.condition: When R-Clicked on a Ore Deposit
item.tfc.pan.tooltip2.condition: When Filled Pan is R-Clicked in Water
item.tfc.pan.tooltip2.behaviour: _Pans_ the _Ore Deposit_ inside the pan, giving the drops.
item.tfc.large_raw_hide.tooltip.behaviou: _Makes_ a _Thatch Bed_, that the player can set it's _spawnpoint_.
item.tfc.bellows.tooltip.behaviour: _Increases air flow_ to nearby devices, allowing them to burn at _higher temperature_.
item.tfc.wattle.tooltip2.condition: When Woven Wattle is R-Clicked with Daub
item.tfc.wattle.tooltip2.behaviour: _Transform_ the wattle into _Unstained Wattle_, allowing dyeing of the block.
death.attack.tfc.dehydration.player: %1$s died of dehydration while trying to escape %2$s
